elementalHybridAbilities.name: Ignite Blade
elementalHybridAbilities.description: You enchant one weapon that you are currently wielding. Each [MELEE MARTIAL ATTACK] made with this weapon deals 1d6 extra fire damage.

elementalHybridAbilities.name: Flying Slash
elementalHybridAbilities.components: V, M (Meele Weapon with a sharp edge)
elementalHybridAbilities.description: Choose if you want to make a slahs in a line or a cone. Then make a Weapon [MELEE MARTIAL ATTACK] against the targets [DODGE] on a success they take regular damage of your attack.

elementalHybridAbilities.name: Booming Strike
elementalHybridAbilities.description: Make a Weapon or Unarmed [MELEE MARTIAL ATTACK] or [RANGED MARTIAL ATTACK], the target suffers the attack as normal but in addition regardless if your [ATTACK] succeeds or not a sonic wave is unleashed in a 4.5m Cone that starts from the target. Make a [INT] [SPELL TEST] against the [TOUGHNESS] of the creatures inside the cone. On a success they recieve ([SPI]/2) * d8 sonic damage [HALF].

cosmicHybridAbilities.name: Smite
cosmicHybridAbilities.description: Make a Weapon or Unarmed [MELEE MARTIAL ATTACK] or [RANGED MARTIAL ATTACK], You add 1d6 + ([SPI]/2) * d6 holy damage to the [ATTACK]. If the creature hit is evil and that [ATTACK] exceeds that creatures [TOUGHNESS], it becomes additionally [BLINDED] until the end of your next turn.

cosmicHybridAbilities.name: Unholy Smite
cosmicHybridAbilities.description: Make a Weapon or Unarmed [MELEE MARTIAL ATTACK] or [RANGED MARTIAL ATTACK], You add 1d6 + ([SPI]/2) * d6 holy damage to the [ATTACK]. If that [ATTACK] exceeds that creatures [TOUGHNESS] it becomes additionally [CRIPPLED] until the end of your next turn.

manipulationHybridAbilities.name: Telekinetic Weapon
manipulationHybridAbilities.description: You launch your weapon at an enemy with the aid of Telekinetic Force. Make a Weapon [RANGED MARTIAL ATTACK] or [RANGED SPELL ATTACK] (your choice) against the Target. On hit the target recieves damage of your regular weapon damage + [SPI] . Additionally every enemy that is on a straight line from you and your target can be hit by the Weapons return path. Make a [INT] [SPELL TEST] against their [DODGE] on a success they recieve damage equal to the weapons base damage (in case of versatile weapon, the versitile damage is used).

manipulationHybridAbilities.name: Teleport Strike
manipulationHybridAbilities.description: You open a temporary portal to enable your Attacks to reach greater distance or hit from betterangles. Make a Weapon or Unarmed [MELEE MARTIAL ATTACK] or [RANGED MARTIAL ATTACK] against a creature. The creature hit by the [ATTACK] recieves no benefit of cover and additionally the creature is unaware of the attack even if it can see the attacker.
